meta.name: Wipeout
meta.description: The re-imagined series will feature new twists and elements that will push contestants' athleticism, approach, and determination to even greater extremes, all while delivering some wildly epic fails! Each game is three rounds with each round featuring a jaw-dropping, multi-stage obstacle course with numerous strategy and decision points designed to further challenge the stamina of the competitors and deliver even more hilarious and surprising wipeouts! And of course, the iconic staple of the show - the big balls! - are returning with a vengeance.

videos.title: Redemption Again
videos.overview: Following the three rounds and three-stage obstacle course, consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge and wear out the stamina of the competitors.
